attributes.action: Stricter laws to prevent knife crime on the streets of London
attributes.background: Another two deaths on the streets of London as a result of knife crime. How many more people have to die until someone stands up and does something. How many more families are going to be destroyed? This is getting worse every year and we must make a stand

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you'd like the law to be changed to tackle knife crime.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
